name: No Scam Gallery
description:
You just opened a museum in town. To complete your collection you have to aquire artworks before the inauguration. 

Check the objects that people come to donate... But examine them closely, there are fakes!

How to play

Take a piece of art or a reference picture using left click.

Once taken, examen a piece of art by maintening left click and moving.

Make sure it match the reference picture(s)

Put back a piece of art or a reference picture with right click.

There might be a few bugs and there are no sounds nor music yet. This will be added in future versions.

Web and Linux builds will be added after the jam is over.
